A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie challenged me at several points. I was never sure which way the tide would turn. Being the middle entry in a third trilogy\, it had to leave room for more. Honestly I hated The Force Awakens due to the way Luke\, Han and Leia were written. Thankfully\, this redeemed Luke and Leia!!! I am disappointed with the public reaction as I think this was going in a very interesting and fruitful direction. Sadly this director may not get a chance to guide the next installment. Here’s hoping Disney sticks with him anyway!
